item.title: Can Socialism and Capitalism Coexist? The Sweet Spot.
item.description: Lately, I’ve been thinking a lot about The Motorcycle Diaries—you know, the one about the young Ernesto “Che” Guevara traveling across South America and slowly realizing how messed up things are for the poor.
